Localization.Name: Anvil Aerospace
Localization.Description: For civilians, Anvil Aerospace produces small fighting craft but with less of the pirate stigma. These ships are more expensive, less spit-and-glue, and built to take more hits than a comparable Drake model. The bulk of Anvil's income is from its military contracts with the UEE to design and build their warships, especially the iconic Hornet.

English.Name: Anvil Aerospace
English.Description: For civilians, Anvil Aerospace produces small fighting craft but with less of the pirate stigma. These ships are more expensive, less spit-and-glue, and built to take more hits than a comparable Drake model. The bulk of Anvil's income is from its military contracts with the UEE to design and build their warships, especially the iconic Hornet.

Localization.Name: Turret
Localization.Description: Multitask on the battlefield with this remote turret system. Featuring precise controls and a wide field of fire, the turret allows pilots to add combat support to their resume.
